climbs.name: Lift Your Skinny Fists Like Antennas To Heaven

content.description:
A striking very baggy hands splitter. 

  Pitch 1 (5.something easyish)   Once you can see the splitter hike the gully to the left and traverse right on the limestone band. When you run out of limestone, build a belay in the floor and down climb a ledge. Then smile your way back up to the base of the splitter and a bolted anchor.  

  Bring all you gear to this belay as you rap to the ground from here on the descent. 

  Pitch 2 5.11- | 35m   Follow the system up to an anchor on a small ledge to the right. 

  Pitch 3 5.11- | 13.41m   Thrutch up the system to a large ledge 

  Descent.   Make three raps back down the route.
content.location: Marg's Draw. See location beta in Panera Loaf area.

content.description: Large muffin shaped butte in Marg's Draw
